name: Freedom Lost: A Lost Pirates Tale
name_original: Freedom Lost: A Lost Pirates Tale
description:
Ahoy, me hearties!

Dive into a new adventure wit' the crusty crew o' Ye Scallywags. A ragtag bunch o' pirates out fer adventure, glory 'n booty! Lead by Cap'n Bill Bones they ne'er know wha' the next adventure might bring but that's how they like it.

Meet th' unique characters 'n explore the wacky island o' Baka Baru Baru as ye help the trapped crew find a secret map so they can charter thar escape from the island.

Ye sea legs await bucko!

Simple controls fer me landlubbers

  • Left & Right Arrow Keys to move yer body
  • Up Arrow Key Key to jump up ‘n down
  • S for ye Special
  • D if ye gets stucked
Dead men tell no tales!

The game was built by me usin' assets, big thanks especially th' amazin' Pixel Pixel Frog fer makin' the assets available.

Mainly used the Treasure Hunters bundle but here be a collection I put together while plannin' 'n makin' the game.

*Not all were used, but all were considered & might still be added later

My First Game Jam a collection by AvectaTV

Pixel Frog's Page

Shiver Me Timbers!

Avast ye please let me know what you thought, but it bein' me first foray into game dev, please so no flogging us aye

Thank ye fer takin' the time t' check out me we game ye scallywags!
